"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import { Navbar as BSNavbar, Nav, Container, Button, Offcanvas, Dropdown } from "react-bootstrap" import { isAuthenticated, getCurrentUser, getUserRole } from "../../utils/auth" const Navbar = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const location = useLocation() const authenticated = isAuthenticated() const user = getCurrentUser() const userRole = getUserRole() const [showSidebar, setShowSidebar] = useState(false) const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("token") localStorage.removeItem("user") navigate("/") } const getDashboardLink = () => { switch (userRole) { case "student": return "/student-dashboard" case "faculty": return "/faculty-dashboard" case "admin": return "/admin-dashboard" default: return "/" } } const sidebarLinks = [ { path: getDashboardLink(), label: "Dashboard", icon: "🏠" }, { path: "/courses", label: "Courses", icon: "📚" }, { path: "/events", label: "Events", icon: "📅" }, { path: "/placements", label: "Placements", icon: "🎯" }, { path: "/profile", label: "Profile", icon: "👤" }, ] const isDashboardRoute = ["/student-dashboard", "/faculty-dashboard", "/admin-dashboard"].includes(location.pathname) return ( <>
🎓

Smart Campus

Portal
{authenticated ? ( <> {isDashboardRoute && ( )}
{userRole === "student" && "🎓"} {userRole === "faculty" && "👨‍🏫"} {userRole === "admin" && "🔒"}
{user?.name} 🏠 Dashboard 👤 Profile 🚪 Logout ) : (
)}
setShowSidebar(false)} placement="start" className="glass-card-dark">
🎓 Navigation Menu
{sidebarLinks.map((link) => ( setShowSidebar(false)} > {link.icon} {link.label} ))}
) } export default Navbar
